programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 73
programme.desc: Start your day with the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. James Glenday and Emma Rebellato bring you news and interviews, joined by Charles Brice, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 73
programme.desc: When you need to know what's going on in the morning, turn to Dan Bourchier for up to the minute news and events as they unfold. Plus the latest in politics, business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 73
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Melissa Mackay brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Native Plant Special
programme.desc: Costa tours revitalised Goulburn wetland; Jane explores a shady native garden; Clarence visits a grass-growing nursery; Tammy immerses herself in native flowers; and we meet an ethnobotanist who records Indigenous knowledge.

programme.title: Built To Survive - Desert Dwellers
programme.desc: In the endless heat of the sands near Munga Thirri, (The Simpson Desert), Phil encounters Australia's largest lizard - the perentie, our fastest flightless bird - the emu, and the world's largest marsupial - the red kangaroo.

programme.title: One Plus One - The Elders - Fred Hooper
programme.desc: Beside the Culgoa River in NSW, Murrawarri man Fred Hooper tells the stories of his ancestors. The water rights advocate shares his fight for his Nation's independence and why he walked out of the Uluru summit in 2017.

programme.title: The Pacific - Episode 5
programme.desc: The Pacific region is rich with culture, people and stories. Johnson Raela and Alice Lolohea bring you the stories that matter to the Pacific and the most up-to-date information, from journalists with deep regional expertise.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 8
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 55
programme.desc: A daily wrap of everything you need to know in politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to experts on issues driving the news cycle ahead of the May 3 Election.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien - Episode 55
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Native Plant Special
programme.desc: Costa tours revitalised Goulburn wetland; Jane explores a shady native garden; Clarence visits a grass-growing nursery; Tammy immerses herself in native flowers; and we meet an ethnobotanist who records Indigenous knowledge.

programme.title: Back Roads - Tarkine, TAS
programme.desc: Tasmania's north-west embraces one of the oldest and most spectacular areas in the world. Actress Marta Dusseldorp joins Back Roads for a journey of discovery through one of the most magical places on earth, the Tarkine.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 5 - Collingwood v Sydney Swans
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: The World - Episode 14
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's going on in our world. At 9pm AEST, Manny Tsigas brings you the latest international news and interviews with correspondents and guests.

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition - Episode 11
programme.desc: Join John Barron and Chas Licciardello as they take a deeper look at the people, issues and politics driving America this week. Plus longer interviews and in-depth discussions on the second Trump presidency.

programme.title: Close Of Business - Episode 11
programme.desc: Global uncertainty and volatility as well as Trump's trade wars are threatening Australia's economic recovery. Coupled with a looming federal election, doubt and unknowns have seen many adopt a 'wait and see' attitude.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 73
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Venice is under attack from climate change. Flooding is becoming more frequent. With each inundation of seawater, more salt impregnates the city's historic buildings. As it crystallises, it rips the bricks, mortar and stone to shreds. The city is crumbling. Venice's very existence is hanging in the balance. Can scientists and engineers find ways to protect this unique jewel of architecture, beauty and culture before it's too late?

programme.title: Exploration Volcano 1
programme.desc: Volcano expert Chris Horsley returns to the Spanish Canary Island La Palma. The Cumbre Vieja eruption's destructive lava flow has ruined thousands of homes and lives.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? 1
programme.desc: Discover how engineers bent two Manhattan skyscrapers and then connected them with a sky bridge 700 feet in the air, and in Greece the 10,000 square foot canopy designed to withstand hurricane winds on a building engineered to survive earthquakes.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters 4
programme.desc: A violent attack happened to a tribesman in the Bolivian jungle. Cyril's on a mission to find out what kind of monster fish could be the culprit of such a violent attack.

programme.title: Hippo Watch with Steve Backshall 1
programme.desc: Having been fearful of hippos since a young boy, Steve Backshall sets out to discover why hippos are considered the most dangerous animals in Africa, and if their aggressive reputation is misunderstood.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Hidden Caribbean: Havana to Haiti 1
programme.desc: Before leaving Cuba, Joanna gets as close as possible to Guantanamo Bay, before taking a short boat trip to Haiti, a nation born from slave revolution with a strong tradition of voodoo.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters 4
programme.desc: Cyril aims to catch a fish that can weigh more than a thousand pounds, and is known to be so strong that fishermen have been impaled by its bill.

programme.title: Expedition Killer Whale 1
programme.desc: In Antarctica, the most sophisticated hunting behaviour in the animal kingdom takes place - killer whales creating waves to wash seals off pieces of floating ice. A team of scientists and filmmakers travel to these freezing waters to find out more about these unique animals and how they do it. And one of the scientists is looking for one killer whale in particular. But their mission is not just to deepen our understanding of this extraordinary hunting behaviour. The team are also intent on learning more about the secret - and more tender side - of the lives of these killer whales.

programme.title: The Last Overland 1
programme.desc: The team travel through Azerbaijan, Georgia and Turkey, where they re-join the First Overland route at last. Now it's a road-race through Europe to be home in time for Christmas.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather 4
programme.desc: Police officers form a human chain as they attempt the dramatic rescue of a family of four during Tropical Storm Imelda, which unleashed record-breaking floods on Texas. A hike goes horribly wrong in Hawaii, when a sightseer slips.

programme.desc: Steven is fascinated by a new game at Funland that claims to be able to tell the future.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog

programme.title: Chowder

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Tom And Jerry

programme.title: KL Enforcers (S1)

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Snotlout is concerned when his dragon’s flame goes out and the kids have to figure out how to reignite it before it’s too late.

programme.desc: The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.desc: Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: In preparation for the big race to determine the next Race Cadets, Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to build their own cars. The catch? programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag wants to do something special for her Mom and Paw’s anniversary, so she recreates the boat cruise where her parents first met. \ Tag discovers that nothing is planned for Pawston’s 100th birthday, so she decides the town needs to rebuild the old Bonestand for a big Pawston concert.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.desc: Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: The kids go on a training mission on Dragon Island, where Hiccup runs into an old enemy – Dagur!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When the town’s well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: D-Structs traps the Dinotrux in a deep sinkhole pit – but he overlooks tiny Revvit, who comes up with a plan to help his much-bigger friends.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Wally and Wenda head to Tahiti to help Wizard Wavybeard find his lost Wave Key. Odlulu sees the Wave Key as her chance to become the best surfer in Tahiti and earn a statue of herself on the beach. The Wanderers and Odlulu have a surf-off, and the winner gets the key.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat must deliver eggs, milk, flour and butter to Greendale for the annual Pancake Race. But when Michael mixes all the ingredients together, Pat finds that he instead has to deal with a mixing bowl full to the brim with pancake mix... Meanwhile in Greendale, Sara's attempts at pancake-tossing aren't going well and she soon loses her pancake under the wheels of PC Selby's car. Even worse, Ted Glen's amazing Pancake Machine has run out of mix so Sara won't be able to run the race unless Pat can get to Greendale on time... But Pat gets waylaid by Alf's cows and the pancake mix ends up all over the road. Pat hurries back to Pencaster but Michael now only has butter and flour so Pat has to go and get eggs from Nisha and even some milk from Rosie the goat! With the race about to start, Pat arrives just in time with all the ingredients necessary for Ted to make Sara a fresh pancake. SDS Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place… but everywhere they try is just too noisy… I wonder why that could be?!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Everyone in Brickabuild keeps falling asleep and no one can get any building work finished. It's all because the lights keep coming on all night! Noddy decides to investigate who is turning the lights on. Bravely overcoming his own fear of the dark, he follows the clues to discover that the lights are being secretly turned on by a scared Carlton, who doesn't like the dark. Kind Noddy tells him that he's not the only one scared of the dark and after Carlton is given a cuddle device to cuddle, everyone can get a good night's sleep! Sleep tight, Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelp’s “fun-crastinating” puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.desc: Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Snotlout is concerned when his dragon’s flame goes out and the kids have to figure out how to reignite it before it’s too late.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp it’s a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: In preparation for the big race to determine the next Race Cadets, Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to build their own cars. The catch? The car parts are scattered throughout Pawston. \ The Not Yet Cadets compete in the final race to see which team will join the Race Cadets.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag wants to do something special for her Mom and Paw’s anniversary, so she recreates the boat cruise where her parents first met. \ Tag discovers that nothing is planned for Pawston’s 100th birthday, so she decides the town needs to rebuild the old Bonestand for a big Pawston concert.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade head to the docks to take Klaus and Veruca to England, and Po tries to have fun with her on their last day together. However, Klaus and Veruca break free and hold Po hostage; Blade shockingly gives up the location of the fire whip to save him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.desc: Dulcinea pulls a magical sword from a stone and becomes enchanted with heroic powers; Puss must help her learn how to control her newfound strength.

programme.title: Dali & Cocky Prince
programme.desc: Price was never a concern for Dali, who was born rich. However, in an overnight, she is left with nothing due to her father's sudden death and bankruptcy. In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. Top male reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle till the end in front of five celebrity hosts!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap at ang paggamit ng balangkas sa pagpapakita ng nakalap na impormasyon. Matutuhan din dito kung paano magpahayag ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the concept of area and volume of triangles, parallelograms and trapezoids. These episodes also teach about bar graphs and simple experiments.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about writing short stories and journals. These episodes also talk about different sources of information.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang pang-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa kaniyang mga karapatan at tungkulin bilang mamamayang Filipino.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the different types of soil, the different sources of water suitable for human consumption, components of weather using simple instruments, and the Sun as the main source of heat and light on Earth.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagpapahayag at pagsusulat ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon, pagsusuri ng tekstong binasa o napanood, at paggawa ng dayagram.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about volume of solid figures, meter reading, pie graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about composing clear and coherent sentences and writing a persuasive essay.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pag-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa patuloy na pagpupunyagi ng mga Filipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga hamon ng nagsasarili at umuunlad na bansa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the effects of earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, the weather patterns and seasons in the Philippines, the Earth’s rotation and revolution, and characteristics of planets in the solar system.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang akda ayon sa mga elemento nito. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagpapahayag ng pansariling paniniwala at malikhaing pagsusulat.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of inequalities in a triangle, and parallel and perpendicular lines. These episodes also teach about the key concepts of probability.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the different sources of information and grammatical signals. These also talk about communicating skills and writing paragraphs.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa kahalagahan ng pakikipag- ugnayan at sama-samang pagkilos sa kontemporanyong daigdig tungo sa pandaigdigang kapayapaan, pagkakaisa, pagtutulungan, at kaunlaran.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the digestive system and its interaction with other body systems, the diseases that result from nutrient deficiency and ingestion of harmful substances. These episodes also talk about how cells divide to produce new cells, meiosis, the concept of species, and the one-way flow of energy and the cycling of materials in an ecosystem.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa iba't ibang akda at maikling kuwento na may kinalaman sa kulturang Asyano. Susuriin din dito ang mga tauhan, mahahalagang pangyayari, at kaisipan sa binasang akda.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of measures of position.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on writing research reports, giving definitions, and observing correct grammar.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kahalagahan ng pagkamamamayan at pakikilahok sa mga gawaing pansibiko tungo sa pagkakaroon ng pamayanan at bansang maunlad, mapayapa, at may pagkakaisa.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about how gases behave based on the motion and relative distances between gas particles, the structure of biomolecules. These episodes also explain the chemical reactions associated with biological and industrial processes affecting life and the environment.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.desc: Hope Williams, a successful doctor, meets an accomplished artist on a girls' night out. He is everything her past lovers were not, and she discovers a side of her that she never knew existed.

programme.title: Temptation Under The Sun
programme.desc: While vacationing on an exotic island Detective Cassady Cruz begins a torrid affair with charming expat Travis King, but when his ex-girlfriend, Minnie, winds up dead he is accused of her murder.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something
programme.desc: South Korean actor Kim Nam-gil embarks on a journey with his companion, Lee Sang-yoon. Their first destination is the Punch Bowl village, a place marked by the pain of the divided Korean Peninsula.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: The contenders compete to win immunity from the upcoming elimination, with the Round 1 victor cooking against a pro for the prize of an immunity pin. First off, a coffee-themed challenge.

programme.desc: Photographer Abe Satoru visits a workshop in Yamagata that makes kendama, a Japanese toy, and takes a look at the artisans' bentos. We also visit the late singer-songwriter KAN's favorite lunch spot.

programme.desc: Mr Curry is sure there is a monster in the park lake and Paddington sets out to help him prove it. // It's Father's Day but how will Toq let her Dad know she is thinking of him all the way up in Space? Maybe the Browns can help?

programme.title: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Crabby Boots / Papi's Picnic Party
programme.desc: Dora and Boots meet Shelly, a hermit crab missing her shell, who uses one of Boots' boots. Dora travels across the beach in search of her old shell. // Papi is having a quesadilla picnic, but he forgot the ingredients! Dora sets off to deliver them.

programme.title: Royal Rescue
programme.desc: A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's adorable pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!

programme.title: Bean Cake? / Elote
programme.desc: Chef and Olly promise Bonzo they'll make him a lookalike bean cake to celebrate Bean Day, but their lookalike practice cakes get in the way. // Chef and Olly are planning a corn roast, but Ruby gets stuck at the top of a tall corn stalk.

programme.title: Home Sweet Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max's new best friend, Sharkdog, comes home with him, but keeping him a secret from his parents is a challenge.

programme.title: Unfetch

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: Beast Mode
programme.desc: A Hollywood director accidentally kills his leading actor and has to find an exact duplicate to proceed with the filming. To do that, he must agree to an evil pact which unleashes a band of bloodthirsty, shape-shifting, ferocious beasts onto L.A…

programme.title: Dead Dicks
programme.desc: Richie is a suicidal young man who finds himself very much alive every time he kills himself, although there will be a dead body of him in his apartment after each suicide attempt. Richie’s sister comes to his rescue and discovers the piled up dead bodies in the house. What keeps bringing Richie back?

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted

As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.desc: Richie is a suicidal young man who finds himself very much alive every time he kills himself, although there will be a dead body of him in his apartment after each suicide attempt. Richie’s sister comes to his rescue and discovers the piled up dead bodies in the house. What keeps bringing Richie back?

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Isolation
programme.desc: The story is inspired by a true event. Creighton whisks his wife away for a vacation on a remote island in the Bahamas to save their marriage, but finds themselves hunted down by modern day pirates instead. With no one to trust but each other, the couple is forced to work together and fight for their lives.

programme.title: Cry No Fear
programme.desc: Two half-sisters are always at each other's throats. However, when they are left alone in their house during a raging storm and encounter ruthless intruders who try to kill them, they have no choice but to team up in order to escape.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless
programme.desc: You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Nouveaux Nomades
programme.desc: Kamini learns the basics of medieval combat in Laon. In Lot-et-Garonne, Éric Perrin meets a magician of hyperrealism. Sophie Jovillard goes on a hike in the Pyrenees. In Paris, Yvan Hallouin samples chocolate. Lastly, Guillaume Pierre enjoys a dog-sled ride in Val de Mouthe.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Bien Bâti
programme.desc: Pâquet House is supporting two families with their restoration adventures. Élisa Gouin has inherited a family passion for her ancestral home. And a traditional builder passes on his know-how to his son.

programme.title: Bonjour, Mon Nom Est Kevin
programme.desc: Reaching the heights of popularity in the 1990s, Kevin is today one of the most maligned first names in Quebec. But why? Why such prejudice? Pierre-Yves Lord sets off to meet some of the province's Kevins, Kévens, Kavens, Kévuns... and discover their personal stories.

programme.title: Terra Artistika

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.desc: With Isabelle and Ricardo, it's time to get festive as they prepare cold roast beef with a horseradish vinaigrette, plus spicy devilled eggs with a crunchy breadcrumb topping.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux

She decides to become Marina for good and breaks off with Maël, the friend she'd been through so much with. But Laurent thinks she's lying and secretly requests another DNA test...

programme.title: L'absente
programme.desc: An anonymous writer threatens to denounce Alex/Marina if she doesn't obey his orders. Éléonore has a new boyfriend: Maël, who has hidden his real identity from her. The police discover that Ivan Claes was innocent. Marina's murderer is manipulating them from the shadows, close nearby.

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planète B

programme.title: Le Voile Bleu
programme.desc: After losing her husband and baby during World War I, Louise decides to devote her life to caring for the children of others as nanny and governess. Many years later, thanks to one of these children, she meets up again with all the children she raised over a Christmas meal.

programme.title: Nous Les Griots
programme.desc: Malik, Daouda's eldest son, wants to marry Mariama. But when a meeting between the two families, both originally from Senegal, is organised over a meal, Daouda discovers that they are from two very different social classes. His family is ''griot''; Mariama's is noble.

programme.title: Bottom Of The Water
programme.desc: Ga-young's sister died six year ago. One day, Ga-young is chased by a vengeful water spirit who appears as her sister. She strives to solve the mystery of her sister's tragic death.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husband’s funeral.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil's Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: The Unfair
programme.desc: A demonstration against urban renewal project leads to death of a police and a teenage boy. The boy's father, who claims he's innocent, was arrested for the cop's death.

programme.title: Single In Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: The King's Letters
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: Honest Candidate 2
programme.desc: Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election by dropping the truth bomb on national television, is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.

programme.title: Love 911

programme.title: Where Would You Like To Go?

programme.title: Magdusa Ka (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Dina was the daughter of Dindo and his former maid, Nida. Aware of this fact, the girl constantly dreamt that one day she would be recognized by her father and would enjoy all the comforts of his moneyed lifestyle.

programme.title: Pre, Hanggang Sa Huli
programme.desc: Brandon is a hard-hitting cop on the trail of a drug syndicate. Cooper is a cop from a small barrio in the province. They were as different as night is from day, but they ended up as partners and very close friends.

programme.title: Kapag Wala Nang Batas
programme.desc: Gabriel (Chuck Perez) decides to enter the seminary to escape the violent world his family is involved with. But he soon realizes that he cannot totally breakout from his legacy.

programme.title: James Bone Agent 001
programme.desc: Ninong, the syndicate's big boss, is dead. There are three usurpers to the vacant throne--Crooked Fingers, Boy Macho and Sabrina. To settle the rivalry, they agree on the ultimate contest.

programme.title: Forgive and Forget
programme.desc: Nida and Nestor got married, had one daughter and later on went their separate ways. Sharon was shuttled between them from week to week and all she wanted is for them to be reunited.

programme.title: Strict Ang Peyrents Ko
programme.desc: Lynette was a beautiful young woman, whose parents, Marimar and Fulgoso, were unreasonably strict with her. They refused to allow her to meet men and those who venture to court her were instantly turned away.

programme.title: Ninja Kids
programme.desc: The bagets kids were off on a thrilling adventure ride with lots of laughs when a mysterious old man gave them medallions endowed with supernatural powers. Through these medallions, they could retrieve an old ninja sword from the clutches of an evil woman.

programme.title: The Sarah Balabagan Story
programme.desc: All her life, she has known how it is to be poor. So at a tender age, she gives up her youth and flies off to a far country to earn the money that she hopes will lift her family from privation.

programme.title: Sabado Nights
programme.desc: This is a tale of love and friendship among three young women, whose lives centered on what they do every Saturday night.

programme.title: Totoy Mola
programme.desc: He was already different even before he was born. As he grew up, he became the object of people's curiosity. Until he met the woman who would change his life forever.

programme.title: Pugante
programme.desc: Daniel (Dante Varona) is the best police officer the force has. He is assigned to track down five hardened criminals who have escaped from prison. But he needs the help of "Mandong Lundag" (Jess Lapid, Jr), a convicted thief and a former gangmate of the escaped convicts.

programme.title: Hulihin Si Boy Amores
programme.desc: A former policeman defies the law and meets a violent death.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 11
programme.desc: When a group of teenagers gets involved with a case of counterfeit money, it strikes a chord with Murtaugh. Meanwhile, Riggs pays a visit to someone from his past.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 7
programme.desc: After some concerning interactions in town, Clark is determined to protect his secret identity - a task complicated by Jonathan and Jordan.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 01
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin put their hacking skills to the test as they find out which hacks work best for removing pet hair, grilling without charcoal, and opening a wine bottle without a bottle opener. Plus, they'll uncover the best pool party hacks, and craft a hack-filled defense against the rugged outdoorsman.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 02
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin take hacking to the next level as they determine which hacks work best for combatting spicy foods, peeling potatoes, and keeping the mirror from fogging up after a shower. Plus, they'll reveal the best camping hacks, and see if a fork made from a pencil really does the trick.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 1
programme.desc: Determined to do more than just recover his pandemic losses, Mark throws his energy into expanding one brand, investing in another, preparing mentally and physically for a new movie – and turning 50.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 2
programme.desc: After meeting with prospective new Municipal brand partner Myles Garrett, Mark hits the links with the Flecha Azul team, and officially begins filming his new movie.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 19
programme.desc: Brandon arrives solo to the auction, but still flexes his muscle. The men gamble on an abandoned recording studio. And a trailer with Civil War items incites the men to wage a bidding war.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 1
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys return to White Castle to serve up a new round of mischief, pose as bouncers at a nightclub, and offer phony horoscope readings in a mall.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 11
programme.desc: When a group of teenagers gets involved with a case of counterfeit money, it strikes a chord with Murtaugh. Meanwhile, Riggs pays a visit to someone from his past.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 7
programme.desc: After some concerning interactions in town, Clark is determined to protect his secret identity - a task complicated by Jonathan and Jordan.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 9
programme.desc: Can friends with benefits still be friends without? Leonard and Penny try hanging out alone, while Sheldon must overcome his fear of birds.

programme.title: Friends S6 7
programme.desc: Chandler learns how obsessively neat Monica is when he attempts to do her a favor. Joey desperately tries not to flirt with his sexy new roommate. Phoebe's running style embarrasses Rachel.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 8
programme.desc: Don't touch that remote, it's time for 20 of the World's Dumbest TV Shows... from Brazilian cross dressers and out-of-control bounty hunters, to a reverend who curses up a storm, insane mixed martial arts, and the cheesiest superhero ever to pretendto fly. With hilarious commentary from comedians like Jared Logan, Judy Gold, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 4
programme.desc: Get your credit cards ready, because TruTV is coming at you with 20 all new inventions that will both horrify and delight! We've got a loop to make pooping in the woods even more exciting, a way to cool your man parts for optimal baby making, and asound system for the great beyond that will blow the lid off of your coffin. Supplies may be limited, but the jokes from our cast sure aren't, featuring Judy Gold, Jared Logan, and Bryan Callen.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 5
programme.desc: TruTV is letting loose with 20 of the dumbest partiers ever to tap a keg! We've invited gun-toting men in thongs, a girl whose lap dance goes south, and a guy with a hot dog trick you have to see to believe! Rounding out the guest list is our hilarious cast of comedians, including Rachel Feinstein, Sean Donnelly, Jared Logan, and Mike Britt.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 6
programme.desc: Watch your back! TruTV is counting down the 20 dumbest pranksters on the planet! They're gluing phones to faces, faking pregnancies, and pranking the ultimate April Fool! Totally in on the joke is our hilarious cast of comedians, including Chris Fairbanks, Gilbert Gottfried, Kevin McCaffrey, and Judy Gold.
